This is a Next.js 15 technical blog website with:
- Markdown file support for blog posts
- Mermaid diagram rendering
- Image and visual content support  
- Custom Tailwind CSS typography configuration
- Modern, clean design with Inter and JetBrains Mono fonts

Key features:
- Static generation for blog posts from Markdown files
- Syntax highlighting for code blocks
- Responsive design with Tailwind CSS
- SEO optimization for blog content
- Support for technical content with diagrams and visuals
